Articles.Content: i found a wierd glitch i wanna call a home-page Kraken. it was wierd as i found a destroyed homescreen. i cant send the photo, but ill try
To send a photo, just alt+printscreen which will save a screenshot of your computer screen (in game it is F1). You can send us the screenshot by ctrl+v into the text box.

i think it is not absolutely true in this form, you have to Upload The Screen to a free provider like imgur, and than post the link to the picture here in forum
